change.changenote: Sections 1 to 9 were enacted by 2002-24-1 to 9 effective November 7, 2003 (BC Reg 405/2003).
Section 2 (1) (a) BEFORE repealed by 2004-33-14, effective June 11, 2004 (BC Reg 252/2004).

paragraph.paragraphtext: the British Columbia Institute of Technology,

change.changenote: Section 2 (1) (b) BEFORE amended by 2004-33-14, effective June 11, 2004 (BC Reg 252/2004).

paragraph.paragraphtext: an institution designated under the College and Institute Act,

change.changenote: Section 2 (1) (f.1) was added by 2005-17-15, effective March 31, 2005 (BC Reg 201/2005).
Section 2 (1) (j) was added by 2008-24-21, effective September 1, 2008 (BC Reg 220/2008).
Section 2 (1) (c) BEFORE repealed by 2012-7-22, effective November 23, 2012 (BC Reg 327/2012).

paragraph.paragraphtext: the open university established under the Open Learning Agency Act,

Sections 15 and 16 were enacted by 2002-24-15 and 16 effective November 7, 2003 (BC Reg 405/2003).
